title: Thank you riot for demon VI
body: Best skin in the entire game, i love her voice and wings and tail and model and splash art. 100% was insta buy no ragrets{{champion:254}}

replies.body: *fist bump* the color scheme of her wings are awesome!!!! See you on the rift!
Yeah! i like how they made them super light so they stand out a lot.
will you actually personally see them there?
whipped out my D as soon as I saw that skin huehuehue ....
Why can't they be red instead of pink :(
Isn't the whole skin pink though? i mean they would look pretty bad as red.
